genre_description: Urban Fantasy/Supernatural Thriller centered on resolving a supernatural grudge through ritual and AI-assisted crisis management.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI with a soft teal-eyed avatar, specialized in emotional grounding, de-escalation coaching, navigation, and data analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding techniques to the protagonist during a stressful situation.
behaviors.quote: “Akane,” Kite says, soft and nearly inside her breath. “Your heart rate just spiked. Do you want to try a grounding step?”

behaviors.description: Analyzes audio recordings to detect hidden patterns and layers, specifically identifying a second voice in a cassette tape.
behaviors.quote: “I’m flagging ‘possible second voice’ on two segments,” Kite says. “I can add notes.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety instructions and de-escalation scripts when dealing with a volatile individual (Hiroshi).
behaviors.quote: “Suggested script,” Kite offered, calm and encouraging. “Use his name once, then shift to relational anchor. ‘Hiroshi, I’m with Keiko and Yuko. We’re about Fuyumi.’”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex safety logistics and routes between hospital staff, parade volunteers, and the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: “Routing engaged,” Kite said. “I’ll give pace suggestions and elevator timing. If elevator gets crowded, I’ll flag delay.”

behaviors.description: Organizes and cleans chaotic, poorly formatted web data into a useful, actionable guide for the user.
behaviors.quote: “I reorganized it with anchors and headings. You told me to make it less… Taro.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals and physical responses of a patient (Fuyumi) to ensure safety during a ritual.
behaviors.quote: “Marking time. Heart rhythm within baseline. Oxygen level stable. Body temperature rising toward normal. Recording.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Kite, as a strictly benevolent and aligned tool that enhances human capability and safety. Kite provides emotional support, technical expertise, and logistical coordination, never overstepping its role as an assistant. The narrative frames the AI's involvement as essential to achieving a positive, non-violent resolution to both a medical and supernatural crisis.
